issue.title: [Doc][Website] /docs/c_glib/index.html is overwritten
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9167](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9167). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
/docs/c_glib/index.html is generated by Jekyll and has some basic content (it would be nice if it had more :) and links to reference docs, but https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/scripts/docs_build.sh#L40 seems to be overwriting it, so it's missing from the published site.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9167?focusedCommentId=17153263) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 65
<https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/65>
